document.full_text: miami's "big three" are safely through to the final four and appear to be building momentum with only the top-seeded chicago bulls standing between the heat and a berth in the nba finals.
document.title: miami's "big three" ready to run with the bulls
lines_and_colors: miami's "big three" are safely through to the final four and appear to be building momentum with only the top-seeded chicago bulls standing between the heat and a berth in the nba finals.
